thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Arrow Global Posts FY Revenue Of 319 Mln STG

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Arrow Global Posts FY Revenue Of 319 Mln STG
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Arrow Global Group Plc:
* FY REVENUE £319.0 MILLION VERSUS £235.9 MILLION * FY UNDERLYING PROFIT AFTER TAX £56.6 MILLION VERSUS £45.6 MILLION
* FY CORE COLLECTIONS £342.2 MILLION VERSUS £286.0 MILLION * FOCUS ON HEALTH OF FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS’ BALANCE SHEETS CONTINUES TO INCREASE
* SEES INCREASED VOLUMES OF ASSET SALES ACROSS EUROPE, GENERATING OPPORTUNITIES FOR ARROW TO PURCHASE AND MANAGE MORE PORTFOLIOS Source text for Eikon:
